QuestData.Title: Barrels of Fun
QuestData.Description: Oh, well now, let's have us some fun, $g boyo : girly;!$B$BThose Ordo yaungol to the northwest have saved us the trouble o' havin' to make some bombs. They already have them there.$B$BLet's put their explosive barrels to good use and destroy their oil-pumpin' machines, shall we?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Explosive Barrels found in Fire Camp Ordo to destroy the West, South, and East Oil Rigs.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'm a wee bit surprised by the lack o' explosions I've seen so far.$B$BAre you well?
QuestData.RewardText: Ho ho, that were a fine sight to see. I knew I should have gone up there with ya, $n!
